Articles.Content: hello everyone Love this gameit great. just one question once your in space do you every get anywhere or do you fly for ever. so far I'm 2 hours into my flight and at 17K+ and still going.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Currently there is nowhere else to fly to but there are plans for a moon and other celestial bodies. For the most part we've been challenging each other to various feats and records for something to do while testing.

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky
